Label: Location name
Description: The name of a stock location. Optional, and repeatable to provide parallel names for a single location in multiple languages (eg Baile Átha Cliath and Dublin, or Bruxelles and Brussel). It may if necessary include a postal code (eg 10680 Αθήνα, or 20090 Assago). The language attribute is optional for a single instance of <LocationName>, but must be included in each instance if <LocationName> is repeated.
Format: <dd>Variable length text, suggested maximum length 100 characters</dd>
